channel.title: Yasmine Esser - Harper's Bazaar on Terence Dores Cruz - Postdoctoral Researcher
channel.description: Recent content in Yasmine Esser - Harper's Bazaar on Terence Dores Cruz - Postdoctoral Researcher

item.title: Zo ga je als leidinggevende om met roddelen op de werkvloer
item.description: Interview with journalist Yasmine Esser about how my work on how gossip and reputation in everyday life can give insight into gossip at work published on the website ‘Harper’s Bazaar’.
